thread.title: Asin to have a Delhi wedding on Nov 26
thread.title_full: Asin to have a Delhi wedding on Nov 26 - The Times of India

author: Divya Kaushik
title: Asin to have a Delhi wedding on Nov 26
text: Asin and Delhi-based entrepreneur Rahul Sharma's wedding will take place on November 26 at a hotel on NH8 in Delhi, a source tells us. The wedding will be a "private and closely guarded" affair with only the couple's close friends and family. The couple will also host a reception on November 27 at a private farmhouse at West End Greens, the place where Shahid Kapoor and Mira Rajput also got married. The celebrations will continue in Mumbai as Asin will host a reception for her Mumbai friends on November 28 or 29 â€” the date for the Mumbai reception has not been fixed yet. Preparations for the wedding have already started with the couple's active participation. Stay updated on the go with Times of India News App. Click here to download it for your device.
